Body: Well, look who managed to find their way inside! Seems like you've got as much fight as I had hoped you would. Whatever you killed must have had enough starlight moving through it to get that pylon running again when you took it out.

Title: Alican
Body: Ah! My bad. My name is Alican, I'm a... well lets just say I've been studying this place and its connection to starlight for a while. I'm sure you've taken notice of the ruins around here, not unlike this observatory here. From what I've learned a long time ago they belonged to a people using them to control starlight.

Title: Alican
Body: Well, you see that giant glowing thing in the sky? They called that the Starlight River. These devices would redirect the light from it through themselves, letting them work miracles.

Title: Alican
Body: Here, why dont you try it? This little charm should let you direct some starlight into yourself. Then I'll teach you how to use it to see secrets left behind in the world.

Title: Alican
Body: There you go! Now, focus on something you want to know more about, and see what happens...

Title: Alican
Body: Impressive, you picked up on that quick. I'll leave some more of these here if you've got friends that need them. I trust you'll be able to teach them now.

Title: Alican
Body: If you're keen to continue to persue the power of starlight, or help me with my studies, you should head beneath the great desert. You'll find a cavern where the sand itself has fused to crystalline glass. An old friend of mine lives there, and he'll be able to help you. Do be careful though, its a perilous place.

Buttons.Text: Where do I need to go?

Title: Alican
Body: You should head beneath the great desert. You'll find a cavern where the sand itself has fused to crystalline glass. An old friend of mine lives there, and he'll be able to help you.
